name: onsstopbas

body.origin:
|- wss(con0, ctb)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb))
-| diffsc(hs0, con0)
-| diffsc(hs0, ctb)
body.pretty:
⊢ On ⊆ TopBases
⊣ (hs0 ∈ On → hs0 ∈ TopBases)
⊣ d(hs0, On)
⊣ d(hs0, TopBases)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(con0, ctb)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb))
-| diffsc(hs0, con0)
-| diffsc(hs0, ctb)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ On ⊆ TopBases
⊣ (hs0 ∈ On → hs0 ∈ TopBases)
⊣ d(hs0, On)
⊣ d(hs0, TopBases)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(con0, ctb)
-| diffsc(hs0, con0)
-| diffsc(hs0, ctb)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ On ⊆ TopBases
⊣ d(hs0, On)
⊣ d(hs0, TopBases)

comment: The class of ordinal numbers is a subclass of the class of topological bases. (Contributed by Chen-Pang He, 8-Oct-2015.)
